doctor.name: Dr. Biplob Kumar Saha
doctor.info: Dr. Biplob Kumar Saha is a Hepatologist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), MD (Hepatology). He is a Assistant Professor, Hepatology at Pabna Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Biplob Kumar Saha at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 5pm to 8pm (Everyday).

chamber.address: Shimla Tower, Thana Mor, Hospital Road, Pabna
